Name: Mystic Saga
About the game: Reveal the secrets of the past, find ancient scrolls, and find out about the prophecy ancestors! Decipher ancient spells and find magic keys to mastering the power of all the elements! Enter the fantasy for More than 250 quests! Check out over 15 unique characters! Defeat an evil empress! Explore ancient Asia!
